Everyone learns that when we share foods that are special to us, we share something special about ourselves.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Elmo, Abby, and Tamir come across a wooden cricket. Something new they’ve never seen before! They try to figure out what it is and learn that it’s Dave’s favorite musical instrument from Cuba called a guiro.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Prairie Dawn is hosting a cookie party where all the cookies are baked in all kinds of shapes! Cookie Monster is excited to eat all the octagon shaped cookies but needs to figure out which of the cookies are octagons.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: When Gwen drags Ben along on a hike in search of the legendary Forgeti - a yeti that makes people forget they ever saw it - Ben is dubious.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: Ben is tasked with cleaning the Rust Bucket but is soon tricked into letting the villainous and vile Fly Guys steal it.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: While tailgating at a State U. homecoming football game, Ben teams up with Grandpa Max's old college buddies to keep the crazy clown Zombozo from robbing the stadium blind at halftime.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: While winning big on a Sumo Slammers video game, Ben gets the idea to win a real wrestling match - until an intimidating wrestler named Iron Kyle decides to make it a true challenge.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: While trying to film his own indie film, Ben accidentally lets the Bug Gang go free and when he takes the fight to their hidden lair, Ben has to take on their narcissistic leader - the Ant Queen.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen attempt to stay up all night for Adrenaland but Ben fails to utilise his alien powers to stay awake and starts causing disaster after disaster.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: Ben interferes with malicious magician Hex's quest for the Titan Gloves at a flea market and accidentally switches bodies with Gwen, forcing him to walk a mile in her shoes and vice-versa!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: During a tour of historic Oldeville, Ben finds a rare Sumo Slammers card. When Billy Billions claims the same card, Ben has to battle Billy's high-tech drones which have hijacked the Rust Bucket!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: In a peaceful coastal town, Ben must not only face the archaic antagonist Steam Smythe and his latest creation - the Clocktopus - but also his deepest, darkest fear: squid!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: During a stop at the superstore Shoppë, Ben and Gwen are transformed into babies by nanny-gone-nuts Nanny Nightmare, who will stop at nothing to reshape the world in the image of her day care.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: Ben must turn alien to save the Hoover Dam from disaster, but when tough guy hero Tim Buktu swoops in to 'help', Ben must figure out if Tim is friend or foe.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Max go on a tour of the impervious Fort Knox, but when Dr. Animo incites a hungry ani-mutate to attack the Fort, Ben must stop it before it gobbles up the nation's monetary standard!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1

programme.desc: Ben approaches Geezer Bob about doing a little yard work to earn spending money and accidentally draws the ire of Bob's gnome-neighbours: the tiny, terrifyingly tenacious Billy-Bob Goblins.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1

Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

But when Noddy arrives at the party, the other toys are all scared by a strange noise. Noddy decides to investigate: what's making the scary noise? Using his investigating skills and following all the clues, Noddy arrives at the Naughticorn Stables where he realises that the scary noise is actually a slowed down tune on the music player. The Naughticorns have played it so much that the battery is running out. The Naughticorns have been taking the music player all around Toyland, desperately trying to fix or hide. Noddy reassures them it's not broken, it just needs new batteries in. The Naughticorns say sorry for scaring everyone and Pat-Pat's Pumpkin Party can at last get under way. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Heart Of Dragon
programme.desc: Story of a cop who forsakes his dream of sailing around the world so he can care for his mentally retarded brother

programme.title: The Outpost
programme.desc: A small team of U.S. soldiers battles against hundreds of Taliban fighters in Afghanistan.

programme.title: My Lucky Stars
programme.desc: Undercover cop enlists his childhood friends to travel to Japan to help him catch a Yakuza group.

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: A Copenhagen police officer seeks justice for his partner's murder by a mysterious man.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow 2
programme.desc: A restaurateur teams up with a police officer and his ex-con brother to avenge the death of a friend's daughter

programme.title: Default
programme.desc: A dramatization of the behind-the-scenes story of the IMF negotiations that took place during the financial crisis in 1997, through three parallel stories.

programme.title: Tower Of Death
programme.desc: After his brother is killed while hunting the murderers of a friend, a young man seeks to bring the perpetrators to justice.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two friends who are students at Korean National Police University, find themselves in an endless race against time after they witness a kidnapping and decide to track it down.

programme.title: Dragon Lord
programme.desc: The adventures of a restless martial arts student who, while constantly pursuing a girl, gets involved in the affairs of a gang of thieves.

programme.title: Tully
programme.desc: A struggling mother of three forms an unexpected bond with the night nanny hired to help with her newborn baby.

programme.title: The Monkey King 2
programme.desc: When a travelling monk is stranded in a wasteland, The Monkey King must escort him across the land to retrieve sacred scriptures and protect him from an evil demon.

programme.title: The Medium
programme.desc: A shaman realizes that his nephew has been possessed. However, when unspeakable horrors start happening to his niece and to their town, the goddess that appears to have taken possession turns out not be as benevolent as it first appears.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: We profile Kaye-Maree Dunn, an innovator developing digital data sovereignty and we find out how NFTs can allow us to own our own artificial intelligence. It's an episode that will blow your mind.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, Little penguin Snapper returns to the colony but will he be accepted? The vet team prepare to treat Samantran tiger Sali, and the Zoo helps to save an endangered native species at risk.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, the Ungulate team prepare for a birth, we meet one of the longest living animals and Auckland Zoo helps to save an endangered giant.

programme.title: Into The Puma Triangle
programme.desc: Casey Anderson, a Montana native wildlife expert works with wildlife filmmaker René Araneda to capture the wild pumas of Torres del Paine National Park in Chilean Patagonia. Together, they have filmed things seen nowhere else in the world that will unlock the mystery of the puma’s true nature.

programme.title: Naledi: A Baby Elephant's Tale
programme.desc: Naledi follows the journey of a baby elephant orphaned in a rescue camp, as the man tasked with her survival races to protect an entire species while fighting to save her life.

programme.title: The Secret Life Of Owls
programme.desc: This stunning series uncovers 'The Secret Life Of Owls' as never seen before, using a special camera rig to follow families of owls in a wild corner of rural Essex, through winter, spring and summer.

programme.title: The Secret Life Of Owls
programme.desc: This stunning series uncovers 'The Secret Life Of Owls' as never seen before, using a special camera rig to follow families of owls in a wild corner of rural Essex, through winter, spring and summer.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: It is the home stretch with just one more country on Manu's list. America offers amazing food experiences on his final leg of his adventure. Around the world. Thirty days. $20,000 to spend. Will Manu achieve his dream?

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the most fascinating Chinese provinces - Yunnan. Infused with spice and fragrance from Southeast and Central Asia, people from all around China have fallen in love with this cuisine and culture.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw is in Fujian - a place with a long history of migration where the movement of people left an enduring mark that manifested in its food and culture.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: California has one of the largest populations of Japanese people in America. Their life here and their transition into American culture hasn’t been a smooth one. In this episode we uncover their trials, resilience and delicious healthy food.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: California was once called Mexico before the United States purchased it. In San Diego we eat the real Mexican food from those who do it best. And we go on a beer tour and taste the best craft beers money can buy.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Miami is not just close to Cuba in proximity but the real Cuban food here is plentiful. We meet the Cubans who know the real Cuba and find out how their life here in Miami is so sweet.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: It is estimated that as many as 4.5 million Irish arrived in America between 1820 and 1930. They left their mark on the founding formation of America and we find out more about their history as we eat their food.

programme.title: LFRC: MET Gala 2025
programme.desc: Affectionately referred to as “fashion’s biggest night out,” the Met Gala 2025 is a fundraising benefit for the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City that is held every year on the first Monday in May. The event welcomes stars, young creatives, and industry paragons. The 2025 Met Gala will take place on Monday, May 5 and will celebrate the Costume Institute’s new exhibition, “Superfine: Tailoring Black Style.”

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: The winter is mild and wet, which is good news for some but bad news for others. Red deer are forced to higher ground, salmon have gone six months without food, mountain hares turn a conspicuous white, and squirrels kick their own young out of the nest.

programme.title: Sports Detectives
programme.desc: A photo shows the American flag draped around goalie Jim Craig after the U.S. hockey team’s Olympic miracle win in 1980. But where is it now? Untangle conflicting stories about its whereabouts with Barrows and Gardner, and Jim Craig himself.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Oh introduces Tip to the strange world of Boovian Earth tours; Rejected by the Junior Lady Rangers, Oh and Tip form their own all-inclusive scouts, sparking a turf war

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Skid unleashes an evil robot on Turbotown and has to get rid of the monster himself; Turbo falls for and betroths a head-eating mantis princess.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Ton-Ton and the Trux must protect a cluster of fragile Ankylodump eggs from the Scraptors after an earthquake separates them from their herd

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: The Wanderers and Whitebeard visit Wizard Blizzardbeard in Quebec City, Canada, for the big Wanderers Ice Hockey Tournament. When Odlulu uses the Invisibility Key on herself and Fritz, they become an unstoppable, invisible hockey-playing duo. Wally and Wenda must pursue Odlulu on the rink and throughout Quebec City to retrieve the Invisibility Key.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is sure he has found the perfect present for each of his friends… but what happens if the packages get mixed up?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The Naughticorns have borrowed Noddy's music player to practise a special dance for Pat-Pat's Pumpkin Party. But when Noddy arrives at the party, the other toys are all scared by a strange noise. Noddy decides to investigate: what's making the scary noise? Using his investigating skills and following all the clues, Noddy arrives at the Naughticorn Stables where he realises that the scary noise is actually a slowed down tune on the music player. The Naughticorns have played it so much that the battery is running out. The Naughticorns have been taking the music player all around Toyland, desperately trying to fix or hide. Noddy reassures them it's not broken, it just needs new batteries in. The Naughticorns say sorry for scaring everyone and Pat-Pat's Pumpkin Party can at last get under way. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo's cousin Hornetto pays a visit to the garden and quickly charms all the tots. Stingo and Slugsy decide he must be stopped from staying permanently at all costs!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song “just for them”, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp it’s a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp;he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Even worse;the playgroup’s other new member is Mega Fat;whose animatronic stuffie Wagby malfunctions and threatens the safety of the whole group. Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. programme.title: CSI S3 E16 - Lucky Strike
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: While the archaeologists work hard to uncover a new feature discovered on Lot 5, the scientists have finally identified the area where the gold is.

programme.title: Kings Of Pain (S2)
programme.desc: Rob and Adam test the yellow head moray eel for possible venom effects, but must resort to a risky bite, and venom is not the issue for their next animal: the electric eel.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: When Chum sniffs out a 1920s Baccarat bottle for Ybry perfume, is an offer crystal clear, or does it make no scents? Meanwhile, Corey weighs the odds on a gambling kit from the 1800s.

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: A cartoon studio creates one of the most recognisable characters in the world. Mickey Mouse begins as a pencil sketch, and through a journey of failure, innovation, and guts becomes an American icon.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid
programme.desc: The immortality has captivated us for thousands of years. From the Holy Grail to the Fountain of Youth and the Philosopher's Stone. Can these long sought-after relics grant the power to live forever?

programme.title: History's Greatest Heists With Pierce Brosnan (S1)
programme.desc: A duo of highly skilled thieves who specialise in hotel jobs go after the biggest target of their careers: New York's famed Pierre Hotel.

programme.title: History's Greatest Of All Time With Peyton Manning (S1)
programme.desc: Host Peyton Manning counts down the game-changing entrepreneurs whose contributions to media, tech and finance have earned them the title 'Titans of Industry.'

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: Four bladesmiths are kept in the dark when the shop experiences a blackout. With no power tools or lights, the smiths must rely on hand hammering and lanterns to forge their blades.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: A failed romance in the past between her mother and his father threatened the budding relationship between Sharon and Gabby, in this film, which was the very first movie produced by Viva Films.

programme.title: Sgt. Miguel Carpio: Multiple Murder
programme.desc: An exemplary policeman dedicates so much time to his duties that his wife begins to feel neglected.

programme.title: Ang Lahat Ng Ito Pati Na Ang Langit
programme.desc: Movie Queen Susan Roces made a rare screen appearance as a famous dress designer, who adopted the illegitimate daughter of one of her models, Dina Bonnevie. The little girl became her only joy after she turned into a recluse when she lost her fiancé to the same seemingly unstable Dina.

programme.title: Wanted: Perfect Mother
programme.desc: A dashing widower named Dante (Christopher De Leon) is scouting for a tutor for his daughter, then a girl named Sam (Regine Velasquez) walks in and turned their once lonely home into a carnival.

programme.title: Bitag (Babae at Bala)
programme.desc: Sgt. Nick Nobleza (Jestoni Alarcon) is the straightest cop in the police force. He is assigned to infiltrate the drug syndicate of Mr. Villafuerte. But Mr. Villafuerte is one step ahead as he sets up a trap of his own.

programme.title: Hindi Pahuhuli Ng Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: An assassination attempt by rebels on a police officer was foiled by ex-convict Robin.

programme.title: Bikini Watch
programme.desc: It's a wild and funny tale of action and romance as they encountered a mischievous group of hunks who were out to destroy the beach.

programme.title: Kahit Ilang Ulit
programme.desc: It is blend of the old and new, the classics and the popular as the successful father and daughter tandem of Hajji and Rachel take on a wide repertoire of songs spanning two generations in Kahit Ilang Ulit.

programme.title: Narito Ang Puso Ko
programme.desc: Ellen and Louie are estranged lovers whose son is accidentally shot by Tato, a son of a prominent politician. However, in their constant vigil besides their comatose son, their feelings towards each other are rekindled.

programme.title: Dalhin Mo Ako Sa Langit
programme.desc: Lani (Ynez Veneracion) is an ambitious village lass who wants to better her life. She uses her beauty towards this end and manages to worm her way into a rich family.

programme.title: Tikboy at Pamboy
programme.desc: Tikboy at Pamboy

programme.title: Apoy Sa Lupang Hinirang
programme.desc: Berting (Jestoni Alarcon) is a forklift operator in Don Franco's (Bernard Bonnin) quarry. Elena (Rina Reyes) is the Don's unica hija, heir to all of his fortune. Berting and Elena fall in love in the most unusual of circumstances.

programme.title: Titser's Enemi No. 1
programme.desc: The four members of the notorious campus gang, D'titser's enemy, were busy playing their bad jokes again on everybody. Their favorite victims were their teachers, who got the lions' share of the gangs' pranks.

programme.title: Pieta 1
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Amanda (Charito Solis) and her unconditional love for her son Rigor (Ace Vergel). Rigor grows up not having to follow any rules and he does not cultivate a conscience. In his dealings with the underworld, he meets syndicate head Johnny Wilson. Will this pave the way for his all-out excursion to evil?

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Legends
programme.desc: Kitanoumi became the youngest ever yokozuna in 1974 and went on to dominate the ring for a decade. We revisit his career through NHK archive footage and newly recorded interviews.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! Three former members of the pioneering J-fusion band CASIOPEA now play as the KATSUSHIKA TRIO. This week, they're in the J-MELO studio to chat and perform.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-6.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Goldfish in Japan range from beautiful to comical. A single ranchu - known as the "king of goldfish" - can cost millions of yen. In a 5-minute digest, we explore why they are so beloved.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: In the Western-influenced port town of Kobe, a kitty seeks attention while its owner makes shoes at a custom shop. You'll meet a popular shopping district kitty that has its own designer T-shirt!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights
programme.desc: This ride through Nara, site of Japan's ancient capital, takes us through historic locations bright with the colors of fall, a tranquil countryside brimming with the wisdom of the old days.

programme.title: Design Ah neo: Uniforms
programme.desc: Design is fun! Design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us. An episode on Uniforms.

programme.title: Mitateru-phose #6
programme.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Florence is a city in Italy that is celebrated for its medieval history. Renowned as the birthplace of the Renaissance, from the 14th to 16th centuries, Florence was a cultural and artistic capital.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: Mt. Fuji is Japan's tallest and most famous peak. It has long inspired awe and terror, and is a source of artistic inspiration. Join us to explore the iconic beauty of this famous mountain.

programme.title: OKINAWA: Homes
programme.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: Homes.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: All moms need some "me time." That's why one forward-thinking woman in Kyoto established Mamo Heart, a space for mothers to not only relax, but also get their own business ideas off the ground.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Sekiguchi Itaru helped to restore the pipe organ at Notre Dame in Paris, following the cathedral's fire in 2019. He tells us about his work, including the tuning and voicing of these instruments.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: On this episode, we meet American Jerry Martin, an author of children's books based in Saitama, and Daniel Muivakitonyi from Kenya, a running instructor in Tokyo.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: KAIZOKU: Noshima Island
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Noshima Island.

programme.title: BOSAI:Science that Can Save Your L
programme.desc: In 2021, digital twin technology analyzed a landslide in Atami and prevented further disasters. Find out how it is also used for tsunami prediction.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.desc: When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Chef, Olly, Ruby and Henry compete in the annual Celeryjack Games. But Chef, who's used to winning, faces stiff competition this year. // When Chef and Olly's lettuce goes missing, they become veggie detectives to try and solve the case.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max and his friends visit Dad at the aquarium, but can they keep Dad from discovering Sharkdog?

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max is ready to go on his fun camping trip when Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious illness.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: A terrible storm spooks Sharkdog and he gets loose, threatening to ruin Mom's TV interview.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Lannie visits Carnivore Cove and joins Baby and his friends for a dance marathon. // Baby is thrilled to have a new bubbaloon pal until he faces the possibility of losing it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: A fantasy fire breathing dragon comes to life and won’t let Ryder and pups into the Lookout! Paw Patrol takes to the Air Patroller! // The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Today is George’s birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is Sports Day at Peppa’s playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the “tug of war”. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that it’s not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, the 1st team who does, win the game. But the objects are not easy to gather: the sun, a rocket ship, or a house!

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Henrys in a Snail Race! But Chef's fruit chews for Henry's mid-race snack are taking too long to set! // After learning Ruby is an amazing opera singer, Chef tries to bake a delicate Opera cake while Olly noisily builds a stage for a Stump concert.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Chef wants to host dinner and a show, but struggles when he can't seem to get any of his magic tricks right.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Championship Race is about to start, and all the fastest trucks in town are ready to roll! But when Crusher steals the trophy before the race even begins, it's up to Blaze and his friends to get it back in time.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Pancakeio the Pancake Wizard takes all the pancakes in Axle City, it's up to Blaze, Stripes, and Starla to become superheroes! Using their Super Wheels, they've got to get those pancakes back- just in time for breakfast!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Skye and Rocky go on their first camping trip, but when Chickaletta gets caught in a crevice, they have to call in the PAW Patrol. // Tons of baby turtles start to pop up all over town and it’s up to Ryder and the Pups to get them back to their pond.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Rubble decides to nap under a tree at Farmer Yumi’s when suddenly Adventure Bay gets a huge problem - Alex the Giant! // When Cap'n Turbot needs to get a picture of a rare bird, his French cousin decides to help but gets caught on a cliff!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Roger's frozen food delivery truck gets stuck in a ditch.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Park Ranger Rose's favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: When Speed Meister's rollercoaster sends a pet playdate out of control, Rubble & Crew save the day with a bigger, better, and safer coaster. // The Bark Yard safety inspection is today! But will Motor go boom and cost the Crew a gold safety star?

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Boots wants to enjoy Banana Fest, but the Guava Geyser is erupting! Dora needs to stop the geyser and save the festival. / It's Picture Day, but the Grumpy Old Troll runs away! Dora follows him into Troll World to get him to come out for the picture.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: When Baby and his friends are asked to perform at a music festival, they can't decide which genre of song to play. // Detective Baby Shark and William Watson solve a crabby mystery.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max and Sharkdog try to make enough money to buy a drone for Olivia.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: While Max is out Olivia babysits Sharkdog but she just can't keep him inside.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Everyone's excited for the Foggy Springs carnival, but it's getting more and more difficult to keep Sharkdog a secret.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa’s car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dog’s garage isn’t far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppa’s car back to his garage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when it’s raining – but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now he’s more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when it’s not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision – but that doesn’t stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Clash Of The Titans
programme.desc: In CLASH OF THE TITANS, the ultimate struggle for power pits men against kings and kings against gods. But the war between the gods themselves could destroy the world. Sam Worthington (Terminator Salvation, Avatar) stars as the Greek hero Perseus in this spectacular retelling of the classic myth (and '80s cult classic film). Born of a god, but raised as a man, Perseus is helpless to save his family from the clutches of Hades (Oscar nominee Ralph Fiennes -- Harry Potter films), the vengeful god of the underworld. With nothing left to lose, he volunteers to lead a dangerous mission to defeat Hades before he can seize power from Zeus (Oscar nominee Liam Neeson -- Batman Begins) and unleash hell on earth. With a daring band of warriors, Perseus sets off on a perilous journey deep into forbidden worlds. Battling unholy demons and fearsome beasts, he will triumph only if he can accept his power as a god, defy his fate and create his own destiny.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Leaders Talk

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: Baby has arrived and is growing fast. From milestones to solids to tantrums, parents have their hands full. They are also grappling with life after baby. Can the Internet help or is it a hindrance?

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: Money Mind
programme.desc: Money Mind is all about how to save, how to invest, and how to better spend your money. The show brings you weekly personal finance tips to help you make all the right money moves in Asia. Because, personal finance matters.

programme.title: Asia First
programme.desc: (Live) Top stories, business news and market updates from across the region as Asia gears up for the day ahead.

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Jennifer joins a tour to explore the renowned windmills of the Netherlands. As their tour coach breaks down on the way, they seek refuge in a creepy shed near a sinister windmill with a dark history. When some tour members suddenly disappear, Jennifer discovers a shared secret among them, linking their fates in a chilling revelation.

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: Wang Fam
programme.desc: Boo is a human marrying an aswang, Malou, to save her life, but he soon turns into an aswang as well to escape the pursue of other aswangs. After having three children, Boo and Malou decide to start a more normal and less monstrous family life in Manila. Can they start anew?

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Jennifer joins a tour to explore the renowned windmills of the Netherlands. As their tour coach breaks down on the way, they seek refuge in a creepy shed near a sinister windmill with a dark history. When some tour members suddenly disappear, Jennifer discovers a shared secret among them, linking their fates in a chilling revelation.

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Ten Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Amy gets bitten by a rabid bat during her last graveyard shift as a veteran punk rock disc jockey. When a storm traps Amy, her mysterious replacement and an anxious staff inside their small-town radio station, reality starts to distort as they go deeper into the graveyard shift…

programme.title: Babang Luksa
programme.desc: One year after Carlos’ girlfriend Beatrice died, his new love Anna starts to experience horrifying events. Through a spiritualist, Anna knows that she is the reason for Beatrice’s suicide, which leads to the return of her angry spirit to seek revenge. As Anna’s friends begin to die mysteriously one by one, will she be the next victim?

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: Two disrespectful and unruly students act out during their teacher, Mr Gale’s class. Unable to tolerate their behaviour, Mr Gale decides to take the two boys hostage and teach them a lesson that they will never forget.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Shocking first-hand accounts of people who were manipulated, abused, and finally broke free before it was too late. We'll hear from former members of Gwen Shamblin's Remnant Fellowship, and more.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: Every day, tens of thousands of people get booked into jails all across the country for crimes both big and small. 'Booked: First Day In' is their side of the story.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: A visit to Mobile ends in tragedy when a violent chain reaction leads to the death of a teenage girl.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: A Mobile mother goes missing after blowing millions at the casino. At trial, the DA and detective take a gamble of their own to bring her killer to justice.

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Wade is addicted to gaming. With no job and no income, he is on the verge of eviction. Alexis, 21, has been a cell phone junkie ever since she got her first phone at nine years old.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A defendant claims she's the wife of a prince; a church pastor gets sentenced for running an unlicensed funeral business; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A defendant flips off a judge; a baby interrupts a hearing; a mom sounds off on one of the men responsible for her daughter's death; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. A naked man allegedly steals an ATV; a man who apparently was feeding the alligators gets a visit from police; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest
programme.desc: A man proposes to his girlfriend while getting arrested; an aquarium worker helps catch a shark thief; a horse & buggy turns dangerous when a drunk man is operating it; and more.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: Jamil and Steven enter general population, and as a new volunteer enters the Pitt County Detention Center, another participant questions their decision to continue with the program.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Those closest to Madison Nygard share the agonising details around the beautiful 16-year-old's terrifying abduction as she walked home from a party.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: When beautiful Jalajhia Finklea vanished the day before her 18th birthday, her Wampanoag Tribe members immediately took action.

programme.title: See No Evil (S6)
programme.desc: The murder of an elderly landlady offers no forensic answers. Can detectives piece together her final days using security footage to discover the motive of a vicious killer before they strike again?

programme.title: See No Evil (S6)
programme.desc: 15-year-old Sierra LaMar leaves for school like any other day, only to disappear without a trace. Is this just another runaway or did something a lot worse happen to Sierra?

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a mother of three is found lying unconscious beneath her open, second-story window, Medical Examiner Dr. Dragovic suspects there is more than meets the eye.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: ATF Special Agents Dobyns and Kilday put their best feet forward only to have their lives put on the line. Once the investigation wraps, will they become targets for revenge?

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: After police respond to an apparent suicide, the case takes an unexpected turn when investigators cannot find a gun near the body.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When an up-and-coming defense attorney is murdered in her office, her colleagues vow to seek justice and "make this right."

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Idéfix Et Les Irréductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idéfix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Idéfix Et Les Irréductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idéfix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Le Petit Geek
programme.desc: What exactly does an influencer do? How do you create a video game? Why are screens dangerous, and what about digital identities? In each episode children shed light on today's virtual world.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Têtes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Upset by his family's financial problems and worried about failing his geography test, Félix counts on the powers of a ''magic'' rock. Meanwhile, Vic receives an anonymous love letter and tries to discover the secret author.

programme.title: Ernest Et Célestine, La Collection
programme.desc: Ernest, a grumpy bear with a generous heart, offers a home to Célestine, a mischievous little orphan mouse, in his tumbledown house. Two friends with characters as different as their size; but that doesn't stop them enjoying endless adventures filled with fun and fantasy.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Territoires De France
programme.desc: Discovering the treasures of the French regions, the initiatives and people who bring them to life.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: À Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Divertissement
programme.desc: Divertissement

programme.title: Échappées Belles
programme.desc: Villages in Corrèze are full of personality with the region home to six of the ''most beautiful villages in France''. A guarantee of the quality of its heritage, Collonges-la-Rouge, Turenne and Pompadour greatly contribute to the tourist appeal of this little corner of France.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Rendez-Vous Au Parc
programme.desc: The Parc du Doubs became a regional nature park in 2013 and covers 300 square kilometres straddling the cantons of Jura, Neuchâtel and Bern. It bears the name of the river that crosses it and forms the border between Switzerland and France. Don't miss the medieval bridge of St-Ursanne.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Top 14 Rugby Le Mag
programme.desc: Presenting the day's action in the Top 14, the French rugby championship, with summaries and highlights from the matches, players interviews and comments.

programme.title: Un Dimanche À La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Rodéo
programme.desc: Julia has a true passion for motorbikes. One day she meets a gang of urban dirt bike riders and joins their underground world, one mainly made up of young men. But an accident endangers her position as a member of the gang...

programme.title: L'Été Des Chaleurs
programme.desc: On a hot summer's day, a mother needs a break and a child needs to exist.

programme.title: Objectif Monde
programme.desc: Donald Trump's announcement that he wants to annex Greenland, a former Danish colony, has put the spotlight on this Arctic territory, which is strategically crucial for its fossil resources and geographical position. How is the population reacting to American ''advances''? Why is the country so coveted?

programme.title: Géopolitis
programme.desc: Analysis, explanations, neutrality... ''Géopolitis'' offers an unbiased in-depth look at international current affairs, with accuracy, precision and a constant desire to make an increasingly complex and conflictual world easier to understand.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Maria Casarès, Albert Camus - Toi, Ma Vie
programme.desc: The actress Maria Casarès and the author Albert Camus had a passionate love affair as revealed by their correspondence. From 1944, the year they met, until Camus's death in 1960, they exchanged over nine hundred letters, proof of what a free woman she was, guided by truth and the absolute.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Cambodge, La Magie Khmère
programme.desc: From legendary temples to idyllic beaches, Cambodia is brimming with treasures. Steeped in rituals and beliefs, the country has found its own route to modernisation, as its capital city, Phnom Penh, clearly demonstrates. Far from urban hustle and bustle, Cambodians protect their natural and artistic heritage and their age-old culture.

programme.title: Ramón Mercader, Sur Les Pas De Celui Qui A Tué Trotsky
programme.desc: Mexico, 20 August 1940. Ramón Mercader assassinated Leon Trotsky. Who was he? Why did he do it? A Communist activist who came to the notice of the KGB during the Spanish Civil War, the enigmatic Mercader constantly disappeared, gradually moving closer to his victim. He never admitted his true identity.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie

programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: La Suisse Des Lacs
programme.desc: Spring has arrived in the Trois-Lacs-Jura region, and life returns to Lake Morat, Lake Neuchâtel and Lake Bienne. We meet Patrick, aboard the ''Romandie I''. In the Bernese Oberland, between the alpine lakes of Brienz and Thoune, Interlaken welcomes its tourists.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: In this fitness variety show, Patrick learns how to exercise. // A family of dummies move into the Star home.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: In a Patrick Show episode about boats, Cecil teaches Patrick how to drive. // Patrick time-travels in a race for the Krusty Krab's newest menu item.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Sancho gets himself into trouble in the city, Sergio helps him become a model pet! // Worried that Lori may have a new crush, Bobby visits her in college and tries to impress her with his golf skills.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Tired of doing favors to get a ride from Lori, Lincoln decides it's time to help Leni pass her driver's test. // Lincoln conspires with the rest of his sisters to overthrow Lori's tyranny as their 'baby'sitter.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Dressed as David Steele, Lincoln is on the hunt for his stolen birthday present before it's destroyed. // After landing a role in a Dairyland production, Luan must hide this news from Mrs. Bernardo, who she beat out.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The East River 3 are on the verge of victory! The Turtles and Mutanimals must team up to stop them, but not everything is as it seems... what is the PEARL and why does Goldfin want it?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When customers bring pets into the Krusty Krab, Mr. Krabs soon realizes pets are more profitable than owners. // Plankton ruins another date with Karen, so she puts the Chum Bucket on lockdown until he proves his affection.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick make it their mission to reunite the recently fires robot band from Goofy Goober's. // Patrick is sent to the pound for acting like a worm, but he won't be able to leave unless SpongeBob can train him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
